import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' import * as yup from 'yup' const schema = yup.object({ slug: yup.string().required(), title: yup.number().positive().integer().required(), description: yup.string().required(), content: yup.string().required() }).required() function App() { const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema) }) const onSubmitForm = data => console.log(data) return (

); } export default App;
